name: JM Green R.R.e. Easy-Out Freezer Tray with Lid

reviews.name: JM Green R.R.e. Easy-Out Freezer Tray with Lid
reviews.reviewText:
I needed a lager size ice cubes for storing up chicken broth and 'DASI' soup base. :)
It's a perfect size. If you are a Korean, you could freeze baby food and just take out as many as you want.
reviews.title: It's so convenient for storing liquid.

reviews.name: JM Green R.R.e. Easy-Out Freezer Tray with Lid
reviews.reviewText: It is very easy and convenient for me as a working mom of 2 children to use. It has good color and design too.
reviews.title: Awesome!

reviews.name: JM Green R.R.e. Easy-Out Freezer Tray with Lid
reviews.reviewText:
It is so easy !!
Each ice cube box has a popping out figure and it makes me so easy and happy!! I don't have to use my long nail neither any shape tool to take out some pieces of ice. You just need to touch the bottom of the each ice cube box and the ice popped out like popcorn!!
This big size cubes is perfect to freeze beef or chicken broil to make quick and easy cook!! I also use this to freeze chopped fruit and use them when I make smoothies!!
I purchased three and these item changed my life!!

Strongly recommend!!
reviews.title: Perfect!!

reviews.name: JM Green R.R.e. Easy-Out Freezer Tray with Lid
reviews.reviewText: great innovative product and easy ice. Great for summer picnic due to large cube. Also can use the large cubic for baby food.
reviews.title: great innovative product

reviews.name: JM Green R.R.e. Easy-Out Freezer Tray with Lid
reviews.reviewText: We make batches of organic baby food and fruit and veggie blends for our english bulldog. They both get super excited when the tray comes out the freezer. It's sturdy and easy to remove the food.
reviews.title: It is really convient.
